item.title: System
item.description: Forward from localhost to the outside world sudo socat -d -d TCP-L:8500,bind=<node IP address>,fork TCP:localhost:8500 Fedora Upgrade First run this command and reboot your computer: sudo dnf upgrade --refresh Install the dnf-plugin-system-upgrade package if it is not currently installed: sudo dnf install dnf-plugin-system-upgrade Download the updated packages: sudo dnf system-upgrade download --refresh --releasever=<your destination version> If some of your packages have unsatisfied dependencies, the upgrade will refuse to continue until you run it again with an extra --allowerasing option.
